name: Space Dust Depot
description:
Space Dust Depot is a Level based sandbox puzzle game with the goal of getting a box(or boxes) to the corect goal. Use Convayor Belts, Launchers and Magnets to fill and deliver the boxes!

Convayor Belts move the box in the direction you are looking.

Launchers Launch the box 2 tiles in the direction it was last going (good for going accross gaps).

Magnets pull anything metel towards them however can be stoped by Strong Convayor Belts.

Note : This is only a demo with the tutorial and a few levels, try to get 3 stars on all of them ;)
